verbose_text: However, the analysis of SPI1 (PU.1) expression in monocytes (purple) showed a different picture (XREF_FIG B; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), because SPI1 appeared to be less perturbed by RUNX1-ETO induction in this population, suggesting that cells that have passed a certain differentiation state become less sensitive to perturbation.
evidence: SPI1 appeared to be less perturbed by RUNX1-ETO
